title: Screen Sharing Not Working
description: Fix screen sharing issues in video conferencing apps like Teams, Zoom, Google Meet.

steps.title: Grant Screen Recording Permission
steps.instruction: Mac: System Preferences → Security & Privacy → Privacy → Screen Recording → Enable for your app (Teams/Zoom). Windows: Usually no permission needed.

steps.title: Close Other Screen Capture Apps
steps.instruction: Close other apps that might be using screen capture (OBS, recording software, screenshot tools). Only one app can capture screen at a time.

steps.title: Restart the App
steps.instruction: Completely close and reopen the video conferencing app. End the meeting and rejoin if needed.

steps.title: Update Graphics Drivers
steps.instruction: Device Manager → Display adapters → Right-click graphics card → Update driver. Outdated drivers can cause black screen during sharing.

steps.title: Try Different Screen Share Mode
steps.instruction: Instead of sharing entire screen, try sharing specific window or application. Or vice versa.
